name: Imu
effect: Under the rules of this game, you cannot include Events with a cost of 2 or more in your deck and at the start of the game, play up to 1 {Mary Geoise} type Stage card from your deck. [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may trash 1 of your {Celestial Dragons} type Characters or 1 card from your hand: Draw 1 card.
